title: EcoConcepts 750ml Glass and Appliance Cleaner
description: A versatile glass and stainless steel cleaner, this EcoConcepts cleaner leaves a clean, sparkling and streak-free finish. It removes water spots, finger smears, smoke film and other grime from glass, mirrors, appliances and other non-porous surfaces.
